Class StudentView

java.lang.Object
boundaries.StudentView
public class StudentView extends Object
Boundary/UI class that manages all interactions between the student user and the application.

Supports features including:

  • Applying for internship opportunities
  • Viewing applied/withdrawn/accepted opportunities
  • Submitting withdrawal requests
  • Viewing student profile
  • Filtering internship opportunities
  • Changing password
  • Logging out
This class connects user input to the underlying business logic in StudentController.

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentView

      public StudentView(StudentController studentController)
      Constructs a StudentView with the given controller.
      Parameters:
      studentController - the controller handling student operations

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run(AppContext Context, Scanner sc)
      Main UI loop for student users.

      Displays a menu and routes input to the appropriate functionality until the student logs out.

      Parameters:
      sc - scanner for reading user input
      context - application context containing the current session

    • viewInternshipOpportunities

      public void viewInternshipOpportunities(StudentController studentController, Scanner sc)
      Displays all internship opportunities in the system.
      Parameters:
      studentController - controller providing the list of opportunities
      sc - scanner for input (unused but included for consistency)

    • viewProfile

      public void viewProfile(StudentController studentController, Scanner sc, AppContext context)
      Displays the current student's profile information.
      Parameters:
      studentController - controller used for student lookup
      sc - scanner for user input
      context - application context containing session data

    • viewRelevantInternshipOpportunities

      public void viewRelevantInternshipOpportunities(StudentController studentController, Scanner sc, AppContext context)
      Displays internship opportunities that match the student's profile and that they are allowed to apply for.

      This includes:

      • Filtering out opportunities already applied to
      • Checking maximum application limit (3)
      • Checking if student already accepted an internship
      Also handles user selection and application submission.
      Parameters:
      studentController - controller handling application logic
      sc - scanner for user input
      context - application context containing session data

    • viewAppliedInternshipOpportunities

      public void viewAppliedInternshipOpportunities(StudentController studentController, Scanner sc, AppContext context)
      Displays all internships the student has applied for, grouped by:
      • Withdrawn applications
      • Pending applications
      • Successful applications
      Also allows the student to accept successful applications.
      Parameters:
      studentController - controller retrieving application status data
      sc - scanner for user input
      context - application context

    • viewWithdrawnReqs

      public void viewWithdrawnReqs(StudentController studentController, Scanner sc, AppContext context)
      Displays pending withdrawal requests and allows the student to submit a new withdrawal request for one of their applied internships.

      Ensures valid selection and non-empty withdrawal reason.

      Parameters:
      studentController - controller handling withdrawal requests
      sc - scanner for user input
      context - application context containing student session

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(AppContext context, Scanner sc, StudentController controller)
      Allows a student to change their password.

      Requires reentry of current password before accepting a new one.

      Parameters:
      context - application context containing logged-in user
      sc - scanner for reading input
      controller - controller saving the updated file

    • filterOpportunities

      public void filterOpportunities(Scanner sc, StudentController studentController, AppContext context)
      Filters internship opportunities according to criteria chosen by the student.

      Filter criteria include:

      • Internship level
      • Preferred major
      • Status
      • Earliest opening date
      • Latest closing date
      After filtering, displays matching opportunities and allows the student to revise filters recursively.
      Parameters:
      sc - scanner for user input
      studentController - controller performing filtering logic
      context - app context containing session filter data
